aRchaic
  • Reference

Summarize the mutationFileFormat data into bins along the read length

Build a summary counts table by defining bins along the read length based on the distance from the ends of the read and then sumaarizing the mutationFile format data into bins by counting the number of occurrences of reads into each bin.

damage_build_bin_counts(file, breaks = NULL, type = 1)

Arguments

file
a MutationFile format data obtained from applying generate_summary_data on the BAM files.
breaks
The breaks along the read length used to form the bins. The default os is NULL in which case, we choose the default option of having evenly separated bins defined at spacings of 5 along the read length.
type
Two designs of output matrices available, according to user preference.

Value

Returns a matrix with columns representing the signature and the bins in which the signature belongs to and a column representing the counts of the occurrences of that signature in that bin across the entire BAM file.

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
